issue_name: No enabled Conditional Access policies found
remediation: Define and enable Conditional Access policies (at minimum: require MFA for privileged roles; block legacy authentication; enforce compliant device or trusted locations where appropriate).

issue_name: No Conditional Access policy blocking legacy authentication detected
remediation: Create a Conditional Access policy that blocks legacy authentication protocols and applies to all users or targeted groups, excluding break-glass accounts as per policy.

issue_name: Subscription diagnostic settings not configured for Activity Logs
remediation: Enable subscription-level diagnostic settings to send Activity Logs to a Log Analytics workspace / Event Hub / Storage account for centralized monitoring and retention.

issue_name: Log Analytics workspace retention below recommended minimum
remediation: Increase Log Analytics workspace retention to meet organizational and regulatory requirements (commonly 90 days+; longer for investigations/compliance).

issue_name: Defender for Cloud (Microsoft Defender plans) not set to Standard
remediation: Enable Microsoft Defender for Cloud plans (Standard) for relevant resource types and ensure alerts are routed to the SOC/SIEM.

issue_name: Security contact not configured in Defender for Cloud
remediation: Configure security contact email/phone and alert notifications within Defender for Cloud to ensure timely response.

issue_name: Storage account allows public blob access
remediation: Disable public access at the storage account level and use SAS or private endpoints for controlled access.

issue_name: Storage account does not enforce secure transfer (HTTPS)
remediation: Enable 'Secure transfer required' and ensure clients use HTTPS endpoints only.

issue_name: Storage account minimum TLS version below 1.2
remediation: Set minimum TLS version to 1.2 or higher for all storage accounts.

issue_name: Key Vault soft delete not enabled
remediation: Enable soft delete on Key Vaults to protect against accidental or malicious deletion and support recovery operations.

issue_name: Key Vault purge protection not enabled
remediation: Enable purge protection to prevent permanent deletion during the retention period and protect against ransomware/insider threats.

issue_name: NSG allows inbound RDP (3389) from Internet
remediation: Restrict RDP to trusted IP ranges, implement JIT VM access, or remove inbound RDP exposure entirely. Prefer Bastion/Privileged Access Workstations.

issue_name: NSG allows inbound SSH (22) from Internet
remediation: Restrict SSH to trusted IP ranges, use Bastion, and enforce key-based auth. Remove direct Internet exposure where feasible.

issue_name: App Service does not enforce HTTPS only
remediation: Set 'HTTPS Only' to On for all web apps and ensure TLS is configured appropriately.

issue_name: App Service minimum TLS version below 1.2
remediation: Set App Service minimum TLS version to 1.2 or higher, and disable legacy ciphers at the edge where possible.

issue_name: App Service does not enforce FTPS only
remediation: Disable unencrypted FTP and enforce FTPS only (or disable FTP entirely if not required).
Enable SQL auditing to Log Analytics/Storage/Event Hub and ensure alerting/retention meets requirements.

issue_name: SQL Server public network access enabled
remediation: Disable public network access, use private endpoints, and restrict firewall rules to least privilege.
